 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָעָה‎</span>] **verb** (dubious) ==rush==, of storm-wind (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), ***go quickly, run, be energetic***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***make an attack upon***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרוּחַ סֹעָה‎</span> [[Ps.55.9|Ps 55:9]] ***from rushing wind*** (and) from tempest (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָ֑עַר‎</span>); [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] (not [[BDB#Now|Now]]) [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Dy|Dy]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּפָה‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְעָרָה‎</span>.
